name: @balena/odata-parser
description: An OData parser written in OMeta

scripts.lint: balena-lint -e ts -e js --typescript odata-parser.d.ts test && tsc --noEmit --project tsconfig.js.json
scripts.pretest: npm run prepare && npx tsc --noEmit odata-parser.d.ts
scripts.prepare: node -e "try { (await import('husky')).default() } catch (e) { if (e.code !== 'ERR_MODULE_NOT_FOUND') throw e }" --input-type module && peggy --source-map --extra-options-file odata-parser.config.json --output odata-parser.js odata-parser.pegjs
